mapper.sql: select room_info_num, room_info_name, room_grade, view_type, bed_type, room_img, room_size, reservation_img from room_info
mapper.select: select view_type from room_info where room_info_name = #{param1} group by view_type;
select last_insert_id(room_info_num) as room_info_num from room_info order by room_info_num;
mapper.insert: insert into room_info(room_info_name, room_grade, view_type, bed_type, room_size, room_img, reservation_img) values(#{roomInfoName}, #{roomGrade}, #{viewType}, #{bedType}, #{roomSize}, #{roomImg}, #{reservationImg})
